title: Time Complexity & Big O
story_hook: Your algorithm works fine for 10 users, but crashes when 100,000 users try it. Welcome to Big O analysis.
whatsapp_msg: Master Big O today! Learn to measure algorithm speed.

video.title: Time Complexity and Big O Notation

quiz.q: What is the time complexity of a loop running N times?
quiz.explanation: A loop running N times is linear, so O(n).

tasks.title: Analyze your code
tasks.description: Find the time complexity of the last program you wrote.
